name: RESPIRATORY TEST
title: Assess Your Respiratory Health
instructions: Answer the following questions based on your health symptoms. Score: 1 = Never, 2 = Sometimes, 3 = Frequently, 4 = Often, 5 = Always. Total score at the end of each section will let you know your health risks and suggested recommendations immediately.

sections.name: respiratory
sections.title: Respiratory Issues (Lung & Breathing Problems)
sections.description: Tobacco smoke damages the lungs, leading to chronic respiratory diseases like Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD) and lung infections.

questions.question: Do you often experience coughing, especially in the morning?
Do you frequently cough up phlegm or mucus?
Do you have shortness of breath even with mild physical activity?
Have you had episodes of wheezing or chest tightness?
Have you been diagnosed with chronic bronchitis, emphysema, or COPD?
